actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to assist in the preservation of the Fort Toulouse National Historic Landmark and Taskigi Indian Mound in the State of Alabama.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to provide technical and financial assistance to the State of Alabama for the purpose of correcting slope failures and erosion problems along the Coosa River at the Fort Toulouse National Historical Landmark and Taskigi Indian Mound.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to assist in the preservation of the Fort Toulouse National Historic Landmark and Taskigi Indian Mound in the State of Alabama.
